sub_title: International Management Assistant / Office mgr with extensive experience in (re)organizing main procedures
summary:
A business management professional with an extensive business skills base, gained from a varied and international career path. 
Possesses the personality, professionalism and self-esteem required to manage, co-ordinate and work as a team to fulfill a common goal. 
Strongly driven by the challenge of new opportunities and responsibilities.

Keywords:
Service Oriented • Professional • Disciplined • Organised • Accurate • Dedicated • Integer

Specialties: Coordinate and structure all that is required to set-up a head-office, branch or other business / administration.

• Working in an international / multicultural environment
• contracts, compliance and liability
• Highly organized with a keen attention to detail
• Efficient calendar management
• Organization of events
• Independent worker with a good team spirit
• Self-starter, motivating and stimulating
• Always one step ahead
• Innovative and never gives up

education.field_of_study: Criminal- / Civil- / Extra Judicial processes, procedures and documents
Blind typing, Shorthand Dutch / English, Business Meetings Minutes
Dutch, English, German, Math, Economics, Bookkeeping

profile_positions.description:
• Het organiseren en structureren van het lokale en centrale archief sinds 1972! Waarvan 4000+ dozen vernietigd en 6000+ dozen gecategoriseerd en verhuisd vanuit het hele gebouw naar het centrale archief.
• Het bedenken/organiseren/uitvoeren van een zodanige verbouwing (1e verd.) opdat 3 financiële afdelingen bij elkaar konden zitten (kantoortuin) zodat deze beter met elkaar kunnen samenwerken.
• Hierna de begane grond verbouwd tot een Europese trainingsruimte en een nieuw groter lokaal archief.
• Vervolgens het hele trappenhuis incl. de bordessen kompleet gerenoveerd.
• Het in kaart brengen van alle lokale leveranciers m.b.t. afspraken/contracten en financiële verplichtingen.
• Het ad hoc bijstaan van de Europese directeur van Financiën met spoedeisende Europese zaken.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager / Management Assistent

profile_positions.description:
The city of Tilburg is well known within and outside the Netherlands for its unique way of working called the “Tilburgs Model”. It’s a strong businesslike way of working with the most modern tools from the business market to serve and support the community and all her residents in the most effective way. Within the sector Social Affairs work more than 400 employees.

Main responsibilities:
	Complete Agenda control and manage daily schedule of tasks and appointments for the Director. 
	Making sure he has all the right documents ready and prepared with him for all his internal and external meetings.
	Handle and prepare all his email and other correspondence as much as possible and update his daily action list accordingly.
	Organize, prepare and make minutes of the various internal and external meetings, including the weekly Management Team meeting for the preparation of the official documents of the Council meetings.
	Coordination and oversight of the Secretary dept. of Social Affairs (5fte) for the departmental managers.
profile_positions.title: Personal Assistant to the Director (Sector manager) of Social Affairs
Management Assistant / Office mgr.

profile_positions.description:
Sherwin Williams Paints (USA) is the worldwide leader as a Manufacturer / Supplier of Industrial and Consumer Paints & Coatings with branches and Joint Ventures all over the world. Because of the “Supply & Apply”-contracts in Dubai, the company was drawn into the Construction business / procedures.

Main responsibilities:
	Legal: Manage contract-issues with Main- / Sub-contractors. Verify, update and standardize new contracts. Negotiate, litigate and follow up on respective contractual issues & clauses.
	Administrative: Develop, implement and manage all Administrative procedures such as Submittals, Approvals, Quality, Quantity, Invoicing, Collecting, Payments, Correspondence and their respective Document Control.
	Finance: all accounting on a daily basis such as payments, collections and their pursuit, financial overviews of Bank-accounts, Main- & Sub-contractors, Suppliers and petty cash.
	Human Resources: develop, implement and maintain all Personnel policies & procedures such as Contracts, Payroll, Entitlements, Cars and their respective upkeep and filing. 
	Recruitment: Screening, Selecting, Hiring and Firing of all personnel and their legal requirements such as visas, passports, Driving License.
	Public Relations: represent the Company / Executive Officer with Clients, Consultants, Contractors, Banks, JAFZA and all other organizations, especially with (legal) challenges.
	Office management: Responsible for overall Office management including Staff, all incoming and outgoing correspondence, supplies and all other (personnel) requirements for running a smooth office.
	Coordinate activities and resources of all departments / workers / equipment in office and on site.
profile_positions.title: Executive Officer Representative

profile_positions.description: Setting up MeSmartHome as the online subsidiary of Universal Concepts, a one-stop-shop for Automotive products for the small business- and home-environment.
profile_positions.title: Partner / Productmanager / Head of Administration

profile_positions.description:
The NBC provides a platform where its members can network and coordinates & promotes the interests of the Dutch business community in the U.A.E.
	Planning and organizing of social events / Seminars with guest speakers or special delegates from abroad. Liaison with the different Business Councils, the Netherlands Embassy / Consulate General and the DCCI.
	Strengthening of client-relationships and developing of new contacts i.e. members. Keeping the members-data-base up to date with Contact Management software.
	Providing our members with current and relevant Business- & Trade-information. Creating and sending mass mailers. 
	Planning and scheduling of meetings for the executive committee; taking, distributing and follow-up of the minutes / action list.
	Responsible for the execution, administration and follow up of the Financial Membership fees.
	Responsible for the necessary general documentation / profiles for producing the yearly Directory of the NBC in cooperation with a Media-agent.
	Keeping the Website up-to-date and producing quarterly “E-Waves” magazine on the Web in cooperation with a Media-agent.
	Responsible for all ongoing day-to-day business on behalf of the executive committee through self-correspondence and first point of contact in all cases.
profile_positions.title: Executive board assistant – Marketing & PR

profile_positions.description:
	Played an important role in the smooth take-over of the Dutch branches of USA based Software companies, involving a lot of interaction with lawyers, Management Team, Human Resources, the Labor-exchange bureau and the Board of Personnel-representatives (Ondernemingsraad).
	Responsible for overall Office management including Department Secretaries, Office Manager, Reception and Mailroom.
profile_positions.title: Personal Assistant to the Managing Director
Personal Assistant to the CEO / Head of Marketing & PR
Personal Assistant to the Managing Director
